title: Add support for History API in Extensions
body:
Our browser extension, that is currently available for Firefox and Chrome, relies on History API. Without this API we cannot port our extension to Edge.
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Add-ons/WebExtensions/API/history

comments.body:
Edge Extensions API roadmap:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/extensions/api-support/extension-api-roadmap
History API is still Under consideration
Also for my extension, the History API is a requirements.
Agree. Bookmark API is already in development or developed, but History API under consideration... It makes no sense.
